availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Elizabeth Biddle Foster Lang (Mason County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Thornton Foster. Mother of Amanda C. Foster, Martha Foster, Henry B. Foster, Charles Patterson Foster, Florence Foster, and Mary Foster. Married to Jacob Lang. Resident of Mason County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Mason County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Maysville, p. 110B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 2, p. 113-114.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, Orangeburg Precinct, p. 488B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 7394.
